content: @dusko Do you have any comments? Have you run into other situations where this interpolation condition comes up?

I believe that if you mark this topic as resolved it becomes impossible for @dusko to add a comment later. Due to this, don't think "resolving" topics in math is especially helpful.
posting a comment to the request of @John Baez . I hope this helps.
